title: Pre-nature amulet

properties.name: description
properties.value: The pre-nature amulet is the precursor to the amulet of nature. It is an unstrung emerald amulet which is strung with magic string, granting 4 Crafting experience.

The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Pre-nature amulet
Pre-nature amulet

Item ID6041

The pre-nature amulet is the precursor to the amulet of nature. It is an unstrung emerald amulet which is strung with magic string, granting 4 Crafting experience.

Like the enchanted amulet of nature, it cannot be traded in the Grand Exchange. It can be enchanted with the Lvl-2 Enchant spell. Note that you can only have one enchanted nature amulet at a time.

It is an [[Emerald amulet (unstrung)|unstrung emerald amulet]] which is strung with [[magic string]], granting 4 [[Crafting]] experience. Like the enchanted amulet of nature, it cannot be traded in the Grand Exchange. It can be enchanted with the [[Lvl-2 Enchant]] spell.
